title: Senior Content Marketing Manager
description: Looking for articles written by Andrea Pash? Check out all of Andrea Pash's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogAndrea Pash Senior Content Marketing Manager Andrea Pash Andrea came to Similarweb with a passion for data. More than 2 years later, she spends her days compiling insights and crafting content for the Stock Intelligence and DaaS verticals. Prior to Similarweb, Andrea spent 15 years in the financial services industry developing content for advisors helping them to best serve their clients. In her spare time, you will find her attending as many concerts as possible, jetting off on holiday, or curled up with a good book. Andrea earned her bachelor’s degree from the University of California, Irvine.
